title: BOP Pull & Xmas Tree Installation - AI Probing Questions

questions.question: Your well suspension shows single mechanical plug - does this meet two-barrier policy?
Weather forecast shows potential storm in 72 hours - can you complete tree installation in that window?
BOP has been on well for 90 days - does it require inspection before stacking?
Tree control system is electric - confirm umbilical routing and tie-in to production controls?
If tree fails to latch on wellhead, what's your contingency? Can you reinstall BOP?
Final well barrier schematic shows tubing hanger as primary barrier - has leak path been tested?
Riser pull is planned for night shift - is lighting adequate for safe operations?
BOP connector has been cycled 50 times - what's the maintenance interval and are you within limits?
Well suspension fluid is seawater - what's your corrosion protection for extended suspension?
Production handover is scheduled for same day as tree installation - is this realistic?
Tree ROV panel is configured for Class 2 ROV - confirm your ROV class is compatible?
Emergency shutdown system requires function test after installation - what's the test procedure and acceptance criteria?
